*3Through the portal, a weak magic tugs you from the Citadel.
Your feet hover over the floor as it shakes violently.
Pipes and pistons crash down in a muffled racket...
^
*1Your inputs are dulled and you observe the transferrence of your consciousness.
^
*2Your systems are nominal. You stand with a wizard and bishop. Their faces open
into expressions of surprise.
They are shocked to see that an automaton has rescued them
from supernatural evil. Is your inhuman nature the reason?
^
*3The guilds and churches agree, there is no more perfect arbiter for the
well being of humans. You are entrusted with the tasks of law, assumed to
have perfect objectivity as the new Baron.
^
*2Your rulings are infallible... or are they? What is it that makes you conscious?
You lead Hamlet to its former glory. But future problems may require more power.
^
*1Power you know will always be waiting.
